description: Run unit tests for the state management module.

instructions: Navigate to the root directory of the project.
Ensure the Python environment is activated and dependencies are installed (e.g., `pip install -r requirements.txt`).
Run the unit tests specifically for the state management module using pytest. The command should target the test file `tests/unit/test_state_management.py`.
Capture the output of the test run.
Analyze the test results to determine if all tests passed.
Report the outcome of the test execution, indicating whether all tests were successful or if any failures occurred.
constraints: Do not modify any source code files (`src/ai_whisperer/state_management.py`) or test files (`tests/unit/test_state_management.py`).
Only use standard Python testing tools (like pytest) available in the environment.
validation_criteria: All tests in `tests/unit/test_state_management.py` pass without errors.
